xxcso_020001j_pkg.get_cntr_info_parameter( XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SAME_INSTALL_ACCOUNT_FLAG ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SAME_INSTALL_ACCOUNT_FLAG ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CITY ,xcc.city_ward ,inst.city ,xcasv.city ) city, ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SAME_INSTALL_ACCOUNT_FLAG ,inst.customer_id ,xcasv.customer_status ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.ADDRESS2 ,xcc.address_2 ,inst.address2 ,xcasv.address2 ) address2, ,XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.ADDRESS_LINES_PHONETIC ,xcc.phone_number ,inst.address_lines_phonetic ,xcasv.phone_number ) address_lines_phonetic, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INSTALL_NAME, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BUSINESS_CONDITION_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BUSINESS_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INSTALL_LOCATION, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_OPCL_TYPE, representative_name, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.TRANSFER_COMMISSION_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.BM_PAYMENT_TYPE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.INQUIRY_BASE_CODE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.NEW_CUSTOMER_FLAG, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.REQUEST_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_ID, XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.PROGRAM_UPDATE_DATE ,xcc.contract_number FROM XXCSO_SP_DECISION_CUSTS_V XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO ,xxcso_sp_decision_custs_v inst ,xxcso_cust_acct_sites_v xcasv ,xxcso_contract_customers xcc WHERE XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_CUSTOMER_CLASS = '2' AND inst.sp_decision_header_id = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.SP_DECISION_HEADER_ID AND inst.sp_decision_customer_class = '1' AND xcasv.cust_account_id(+) = inst.customer_id AND xcc.contract_customer_id(+) = XxcsoSpDecisionCustsVEO.CUSTOMER_ID
